name: Summer Days (mijomarch)
description:
It’s your first day working at Scoops Ahoy. 

You’re excited! Kind of. 

But things quickly get complicated when your manager tasks you with figuring out why one of the local lifeguards keeps bothering your coworker.

What starts out as a confusing minimum wage mess quickly turns into you playing matchmaker on behalf two clueless boys who are equally afraid of making the first big move.
